Author: nasihljeung
Text: just to clarify, i feel like i didn't get the point across that my boyfriend does not have a negative view towards food, he loves good food and will clear his plate when we go out to eat, but he hardly eats when he's around the house/on campus. he usually doesn't have much of an appetite after one big meal+a snack (or an equivalent aka two snacks and a small/med sized meal) and doesn't think it's worth eating if he's 'not hungry'  also he's definitely undereating because we talked about days where he's gone with only eating a bowl of cereal and a hot dog, i'm not just assuming that he is.  sorry if this is mad ramble-y i'm still coming down lmao
